```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```




Load Dependencies
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
```

Load Datasets
```{r}
CO <- read_excel("./data/CO.xlsx", skip = 4)
NO2 <- read_excel("./data/NO2.xlsx", skip = 4)
NOX <- read_excel("./data/NOX.xlsx", skip = 3)
O3 <- read_excel("./data/O3.xlsx", skip = 3)
PM25 <- read_excel("./data/PM25.xlsx", skip = 5)
SO2 <- read_excel("./data/SO2.xlsx", , skip = 7)
TRS <- read_excel("./data/TRS.xlsx", skip = 3)
```

Fix typing
```{r}
CO = CO %>% mutate(Mean = as.numeric(Mean)) 
NO2 = NO2 %>% mutate(Mean = as.numeric(Mean)) 
NOX = NOX %>% mutate(Mean = as.numeric(Mean))
O3 = O3 %>% mutate(Mean = as.numeric(Mean))
PM25 = PM25 %>% mutate(Mean = as.numeric(Mean)) %>% mutate(Year = as.integer(Year))
SO2 = SO2 %>% mutate(Mean = as.numeric(Mean))
TRS = TRS %>% mutate(Mean = as.numeric(Mean))
```

Head of Data
```{r}
glimpse(CO)
glimpse(NO2)
glimpse(NOX)
glimpse(PM25)
glimpse(SO2)
glimpse(TRS)
```

NA imputing (TODO: decide what to do with this later)
```{r}
CO = na.omit(CO)
NO2 = na.omit(NO2)
NOX = na.omit(NOX)
PM25 = na.omit(PM25)
SO2 = na.omit(SO2)
TRS = na.omit(TRS)
```


Visualizing
```{r}
x = left_join(CO, NO2, by = join_by("Year", "City"), suffix = c(".CO", ".NO2"))
#x = left_join(x, NOX, by = year)
#x = left_join(x, PM25)
#x = left_join(x, SO2)


```


```{r}
ggplot(NO2, aes(x = Year, y = Mean, col = City)) + geom_point() 
ggplot(NOX, aes(x = Year, y = Mean, col = City)) + geom_point() 
ggplot(PM25, aes(x = Year, y = Mean, col = City)) + geom_point() 
ggplot(SO2, aes(x = Year, y = Mean, col = City)) + geom_point() 
ggplot(TRS, aes(x = Year, y = Mean, col = City)) + geom_point() 

```
